sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Typography, Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, Divider, Grid, Container, CardMedia, Modal, Box } from '@material-ui/core'
import {useState} from "react"
import useStyles from "../styles";
import DropDown from "./subcomponents/DropDownExpertise"
import CssBaseline from '@mui/material/CssBaseline';

import participants from "../data/Participants";

const Expertise = () => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);
    return (
        <Container maxWidth="md">
            <CssBaseline />
            <Grid container spacing={2} direction="column">
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Typography variant="h2" align="center" color="textPrimary">
                    ProMiSE expertise information data
                </Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Divider p={5}/>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <DropDown/>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid container spacing={4}>
                {participants.map((participant) => (   
                <Grid item key={participant.name} xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Card className={classes.card}>
                            <CardMedia 
                                className = {classes.cardMedia}
                                image={require('../data/participant_profiles/'+String(participant.name)+'.jpg')} 
                            />
                            <CardContent className={classes.cardContent}>
                                <Typography variant="h5">
                                    {participant.name}
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography>
                                    This is a media card. You can describe the content here
                                </Typography>
                            </CardContent>
                            <CardActions>
                                <Button size="small" color="primary" onClick={() => setOpen(true)}>View</Button>
                                <Modal
                                    hideBackdrop
                                    open={open}
                                    onClose={() => setOpen(false)}
                                    aria-labelledby="child-modal-title"
                                    aria-describedby="child-modal-description"
                                    >
                                <Box className={classes.modal}
                                    component="img"
                                    alt="The house from the offer."
                                    src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512917774080-9991f1c4c750?auto=format&w=350&dpr=2"
                                />
                                </Modal>
                            </CardActions>
                        </Card>
                    </Grid>
                    ))}
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Divider p={5}/>
            </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </Container>
    );
}

export default Expertise;
